Really great game. Can seem simple and a bit boring at first but once you start figuring out how the aiming system works and overall game mechanics it becomes quite addictive in trying to perfect your play style. 

Hitting consistent sniper shots when you are the last alive on your team is such a rush.

Careful buying cases though. It's very easy to get hooked on opening them and its basically gambling so maybe just buy the skins you want and don't get too crazy buying keys and cases.

The Operations (Shattered Web currently) are very fun but can be challenging. The Guardian missions are be a pain because you have to rely on your team mate a lot.

Overall one of my favorite games. Can be frustrating getting one shot in the head by players who seem like hackers sometimes but its a lot less common once you reach level 21 or purchase the Prime Membership.

9/10

Gra, którą chyba 90% użytkowników Steam'a posiada. Ogólnie to gra spoko, ale jak wyszła za darmo to pojawiło się znacznie więcej cheaterów, którzy tworzyli multikonta, aby po prostu uprzykrzyć komuś grę :/
Reasumując, grę polecam, ale jeśli ma się Prime'a.
